original: 司隸京兆人。奉命率軍討伐袁術，但抵達時袁術已經病故，被任命為揚州刺史。孫策襲捲江東時，嚴象為孫策部將廬江太守李術所殺。
text: Si Li Jing Zhaoren. He was ordered to lead the army to defeat Yuan Shu, but Yuan Shu had passed away when he arrived, and he was appointed Yangzhou governor. When Sun Ce struck Jiangdong, Yan Xiang was killed by Sun Ce's prefect Li Shu.
